review: It was easy to set up, and I was quickly off exploring all the shows I haven't watched.  I quickly had to order the game controller cause I had to nerd out on all the games too.The only thing I have to compare it to is my current cable provider. I used to have HBO, Cinemax, Stars, Showtime... but since I noticed lately I am pretty much paying over 90 a month for a subscription to channels that have a lot of nothing on I decided to dump them and just get Fire. I have more options! At the command of my voice my faves are there for me to view!
